org.fest.assertions
Class StringAssert

java.lang.Object
  org.fest.assertions.StringAssert

public final class StringAssert
extends Object

Understands assertion methods for Strings. To create a new instance of this class use the method Assertions.assertThat(String).

Author:
Yvonne Wang

Method Summary
 StringAssert as(String description)
          Sets the description of the actual String, to be used in as message of any AssertionError thrown when an assertion fails.

          Verifies that the actual String contains the given one.

          Returns the description of the actual value in this assertion.
